title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, September 2, 2021
description: It was on this day in 1901 that Theodore Roosevelt uttered his famous words "Speak softly and carry a big stick" at the Minnesota State Fair.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1901 that Theodore Roosevelt uttered his famous words "Speak softly and carry a big stick" at the Minnesota State Fair.
